title: Problem 2119_B
statement: PIKASONIC - Lost My Mind (feat.nakotanmaru) You are given two points (p_x,p_y) and (q_x,q_y) on a Euclidean plane.You start at the starting point (p_x,p_y) and will perform n operations. In the i-th operation, you must choose any point such that the Euclidean distance^{\text{∗}} between your current position and the point is exactly a_i, and then move to that point.Determine whether it is possible to reach the terminal point (q_x,q_y) after performing all operations.^{\text{∗}}The Euclidean dist
